name: site-audit-seo
description: CLI tool for SEO site audit, crawl site, output to console, csv and xlsx

scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: conventional-github-releaser -p angular && npm publish && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: test -e data/deploy.sh && bash data/deploy.sh || echo no deploy script

author: Stanislav Popov
